website_summaries.verdict: A good value on 2 seats with high backs that fold down.
pros: Universal mount for a standard four bolt
Good-quality construction for the price point
cons: Some reports of issues with durability

customer_reviews.title: Good value seat
customer_reviews.text: These are very good for the price. Pros: easy to mount, good vinyl, good looking. Cons: insufficient back support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t get what you ordered as shown
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive the product as shown. Didn’t want seats with black base or I would have ordered them that way. Picture shows aluminum colored base which is what I thought I was getting. Very aggravated.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: we are pleased with the seats for the boat. very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality seems good but too much padding in backrest causes seat to be too small, feels like setting on the edge all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: High back Boat Seats for FishingBoat Seats
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boat seats! Cant wait to go fishing!
customer_reviews.author: V.Z.

customer_reviews.title: For the price you really can't beat them, but ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can't beat them, but there a little skimpy on the padding. If you spend twelve hours on them your rear gets a little sore.
customer_reviews.author: hootybear

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Packing box in perfect condition but both seats have scratches on back that over time will start to rip, scratches must have occurred during packing or before, but other than that they are good and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: betty platt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and material but it does seem flimsy if I leaned back to far I feel it would break easily, other than that I like it and it will work great for me
customer_reviews.author: Zach maznio

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Thick material. Great cushion. Can't beat the price. Tall back, makes a comfortable boat ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haskew

customer_reviews.title: I thought the price was great for one seat
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was great for one seat. Imagine my surprise when there were two seats in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stearmandriver

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The seat arrived before they said and is very comfortable. Already mounted in a hunt house and will be able to sit all day.
customer_reviews.author: MASN

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these camo seats a month and they are fading. I’ve already a different kind bc I don’t expect these to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Boat Seats
customer_reviews.text: So far the mounts fit perfectly in these seats. My butt has not been on them yet so that's why 4 stars and not 5 yet
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was needing/looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. The seller was fantastic too. VERY comfortable and well built
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lake

product_meta.title: Seamander High Back Boat seat
product_meta.description:
Seamander New Standard Stripe High Back Folding Fishing Boat Seat

Specification:

Marine grade heavy duty fabric 
Injection Molded High-Impact Marine Grade Seat Frame
Anodized Aluminum Hinges
High Compression Foam Padding
Mounts to any Standard 4 Bolt Swivel/Pedestal System with Included Fasteners
Dimensions - Height: 23.25", Width: 16.
feature_bullets: Higher Back for added comfort and Support Anodized-aluminum hinges
Injection Molded High-Impact Plastic Frame,Compression Foam Padding
Fits Standard 5" x 5" mounting bolt pattern

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
